body_html:
As commented above, getting it to work wasn't hard, but I stopped working on it because of the dependencies on code with problematic licensing terms. If that's not an issue, it could be merged into the main TensorFlow sources pretty easily.

I started working on adding support for the preprocess_merge_repeated and ctc_merge_repeated flags, but that's tricky, involving quite a few changes to the kernel--small, but all over the place.

body:
As commented above, getting it to work wasn't hard, but I stopped working on it because of the dependencies on code with problematic licensing terms. If that's not an issue, it could be merged into the main TensorFlow sources pretty easily.

I started working on adding support for the preprocess_merge_repeated and ctc_merge_repeated flags, but that's tricky, involving quite a few changes to the kernel--small, but all over the place.
